    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AuthenticateServlet
    The AuthenticateServlet class handles user authentication requests.
    Employee
    The Employee class represents an employee entity containing both login credentials and personal profile information.
    EmployeeDAO
    EmployeeDAO defines the operations to be performed on the Employee data model.
    EmployeeDAOImpl
    EmployeeDAOImpl provides concrete implementations of EmployeeDAO interface.
    HomeServlet
    Servlet implementation class HomeServlet
    SignupController
    Servlet implementation class SignupController Handles user signup functionality by capturing form data, creating a new Employee object, saving it via DAO layer, and forwarding the response to appropriate view (JSP).
